Posts.EditableText: Firstly you can set the visible feature on the 2 way exits linked to the room, then depending on the room your are in you can create a custom command tied to that secret phrase that can move the player to the secret room through the exits using MoveObject().

Posts.EditableText:
If you want the secret word to open a hidden door, you can make an exit invisible. Then have a custom command for your secret word, that makes the exit visible again.

If you want a room that you access directly by saying a secret word, then you can make a command that takes you there.
